name: Carsten Lamm
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I started with javascript 8 years ago, use it mostly in the frontend. Sometimes even VanillaJS.
what_can_i_contribute: component based UI (React/Inferno) - expertise in TDD, which I like to discuss - How I get started with NeoVim. - I could talk about Iframes and PostMessages - We could play with Bookmarklets and/or Chrome Extensions.
